name: Paperbark
description: Paperbark is a charming game that tells a beautiful short story of a wombat, the bush and a very hot Australian Summer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or Newer DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
